events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their sedan colliding with a street barrier on April 30th.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to involvement of a personal vehicle.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to manage customer communication and claim processing.
The claim was officially acknowledged and customer was notified of the claim number and next steps.
Requested vehicle repair estimates, photos of the damage, police report, and insurance policy details.
Customer submitted all required documents including photos, police report, and repair estimate promptly.
Initiated investigation to validate details of the collision and assess liability and vehicle damage.
Investigation completed successfully confirming the collision circumstances and validating claim details.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover the vehicle repair costs along with applicable deductibles.
Customer provided positive feedback indicating satisfaction with the proposed settlement offer.
Claim was formally approved and authorization given for the payment to be issued to the repair shop.
Insurance payment covering the approved settlement amount was issued directly to the authorized garage.
The claim was closed after confirming completion of all repair work and receipt of payment.
The claim files and records were archived for future reference and compliance auditing purposes.
